shortdesc.ph: Sets the local voice equalization effect.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setLocalVoiceEqualization( Constants.AUDIO_EQUALIZATION_BAND_FREQUENCY bandFrequency, int bandGain);
public abstract int SetLocalVoiceEqualization(AUDIO_EQUALIZATION_BAND_FREQUENCY bandFrequency, int bandGain);

section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: The band frequency. The value ranges between 0 and 9; representing the respective 10-band center frequencies of the voice effects, including 31, 62, 125, 250, 500, 1k, 2k, 4k, 8k, and 16k Hz. For more details, see .

pt.props: android cpp unity flutter rn electron

plentry.pd: The gain of each band in dB. The value ranges between -15 and 15. The default value is 0.
